modmenu.descriptionTranslation.confirmdi: Adds a confirmation dialogue before exiting your world/server!
confirm-disconnect.use-discrete-confirma: Adds the confirmation button to the original disconnect button instead of opening a new screen.
confirm-disconnect.enable-in-singleplaye: Enables the confirmation when quitting a singleplayer world.
confirm-disconnect.enable-in-multiplayer: Enables the confirmation when disconnecting from a multiplayer world.
confirm-disconnect.delay.description: Time in seconds before buttons are clickable.
confirm-disconnect.confirm-on-left.descr: Moves the confirmation button to the left and the back button to the right.
confirm-disconnect.are-you-sure-local: Are you sure you want to quit?
confirm-disconnect.are-you-sure-multipla: Are you sure you want to disconnect?
